parameters.query: SELECT pp.partner_id, pp.partner_name, pp.email, pp.revenue_share_percent, pp.channel_id, pp.payout_method, pp.payout_account_id, pp.payout_currency FROM partner_profiles pp WHERE pp.status = 'active' AND ($1 IS NULL OR pp.partner_id = $1)

SELECT pu.upload_id, pu.video_url, pu.produced_video_url, COALESCE(vr.total_revenue, 0) as video_revenue, COALESCE(vr.views, 0) as views FROM partner_uploads pu LEFT JOIN video_revenue vr ON pu.produced_video_url = vr.video_url WHERE pu.partner_id = $1 AND pu.status = 'published' AND pu.published_at BETWEEN $2 AND $3

INSERT INTO partner_payouts (partner_id, period_start, period_end, video_count, total_views, total_revenue, revenue_share_percent, partner_share, platform_share, payout_status, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9, 'pending', NOW()) ON CONFLICT (partner_id, period_start, period_end) DO UPDATE SET video_count = $4, total_views = $5, total_revenue = $6, partner_share = $8, platform_share = $9, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING payout_id
